column3: We had a good holiday, but we were disappointed {{c1::with}} the hotel.
Tanya doesn't look well. I'm worried {{c1::about}} her.
Brad is annoyed {{c1::with}} me because I didn't agree with him.
Are you still upset {{c1::about}} what I said to you yesterday?
What's wrong? What are you annoyed {{c1::about}}?
I'm trying to learn Russian, but I'm not very satisfied {{c1::with}} my progress.
